reviews.comment: This is a classic. A must-read for everyone!
A thought-provoking novel that is still relevant today.
I didn't enjoy this book as much as I thought I would.
A beautifully written story with memorable characters.
One of the best books I've ever read. Orwell was ahead of his time.
I found the book to be slow-paced and predictable.
To Kill a Mockingbird is a timeless classic that everyone should read at least once in their lifetime.
I enjoyed reading The Catcher in the Rye. The protagonist was relatable and the writing style was unique.
I appreciated the message of 1984, but I didn't enjoy reading it.
A moving story that explores themes of racism and social injustice.
